behavior: Allyce Is's ideal is unity. Her flaw is vengeful, her bond is loyalty, her behavior is intuitive, and her nature is adventurous.
image_prompt: IMAGE_TYPE: High-Angle Portrait in the style of Alexandra Douglass and Yuko Shimizu | GENRE: Fantasy | SCENE: an Archaeologist Dragonborn named Allyce Is | ACTOR: Allyce Is is a Shapely female Dragonborn. Allyce Is has red bun hair and different-colored eyes. | TONES: Coffee and Chartreuse | LIGHTING: Rembrandt Lighting | TAGS: tall, muscular, dragon-like face, scales, tail, claws, frills, anthropomorphic dragon, reptilian, fearsome, Forgotten Realms, Medieval Fantasy, D&D, Dungeons & Dragons. --s 1000 --upbeta --seed 1343
personality_description: Allyce Is is an idealist who longs for unity in the world. She can be vengeful when she feels betrayed, and she is fiercely loyal to her friends and family. Allyce is an intuitive thinker and an adventurous spirit.
background_story: Allyce Is was born into a family of archaeologists in the Forgotten Realms. She grew up listening to stories of ancient civilizations and dreaming of discovering lost treasures. When she was old enough, she set out on her own to explore the world. She quickly realized that she had a talent for finding hidden objects and unlocking ancient mysteries. She also discovered that she enjoyed the thrill of adventure and the excitement of combat. She became a rogue archaeologist, using her skills to find treasure and fight monsters. She has made a name for herself as a daring adventurer, and she is always looking for her next big adventure.
